page.title: 13A TYPICAL WEEK-END(REBECCA)
page.content: On Saturdays and Sundays I have an extra half hour in bed. When I get up on Saturday, I often walk down the High Street to get some shopping for my mum.At this time of the year, we are beginning to think about Christmas shopping. On Saturday afternoons, I sometimes go to watch Builth playing football with my dad and in the evening, I go to a Wyeside dico if there is one.On Sunday mornings I go to church and afterwards visit my nan, sometimes staying for dinner. After dinner,I go home and then call for friends. If it is a pleasant day,we go down to the Groe on our bikes and play on the slide and swings. If the weather should be bad, I mostly stay in and play with my brother or do some knitting and sewing.On a very fine day, we might all go for a ride in the car.
